Megatron:





Megatron landed at the mouth of the Predacon cave and stormed in. His metal 
feet banged heavily on the rocky ground. "Dark Mouse, Scorponok!" he called, 
thinking they may be the only ones here. Scorponok may have just got out of 
the CR tank.

He looked around. "Where is everyone?"
